20101217220040.333|20101217220042.000|CCO|UNBREAKABLE SPIRIT.

20101217220043.667|20101217220045.333|CCO|THAT WILMINGTON WAS HIT BY A 
20101217220045.333|20101217220047.000|CCO|SELF-DESCRIBED ECONOMIC

20101217220050.333|20101217220052.000|CCO|FACTORY DOORS.

20101217220054.000|20101217220056.000|CCO|12,000 FOUND THEMSELVES 
20101217220056.000|20101217220058.000|CCO|SUDDENLY UNEMPLOYED, JUST IN 
20101217220058.000|20101217220100.000|CCO|TIME FOR CHRISTMAS.

20101217220105.333|20101217220108.667|CCO|OHIO, WAS TO BECOME 
20101217220108.667|20101217220112.000|CCO|POTTERSVILLE OR BEDFORD

20101217222537.000|20101217222538.667|CCO|>> I THINK GOD IS TRYING TO 
20101217222538.667|20101217222540.333|CCO|SHOW AN EXAMPLE OF HIS 
20101217222540.333|20101217222542.000|CCO|KINGDOM.
20101217222542.000|20101217222544.500|CCO|AND IF IT'S A COMMUNITY IN 
20101217222544.500|20101217222547.000|CCO|TIME OF HARDSHIP, LOVE IS 
20101217222547.000|20101217222549.500|CCO|BROKEN AND PULL TOGETHER.
20101217222549.500|20101217222552.000|CCO|WITH 32 CHURCHES INVOLVED.
20101217222552.000|20101217222553.667|CCO|EACH CHURCH DOES ONE MEAL A 
20101217222553.667|20101217222555.333|CCO|MONTH.
20101217222555.333|20101217222557.000|CCO|>> WHEN A GIRL CAME IN, SHE 
20101217222557.000|20101217222558.667|CCO|HAD A YOUNG CHILD.
20101217222558.667|20101217222600.333|CCO|SHE CAME IN AND DESPERATELY

20101217222602.000|20101217222603.667|CCO|SHE HAD NO UNEMPLOYMENT.
20101217222603.667|20101217222605.333|CCO|SHE DIDN'T KNOW WHAT SHE WAS 
20101217222605.333|20101217222607.000|CCO|GOING TO DO.
20101217222607.000|20101217222608.667|CCO|MY FRONTESK STAFF MEMBER 
20101217222608.667|20101217222610.333|CCO|SAID I WILL CUT MY HOURS BY 
20101217222610.333|20101217222612.000|CCO|THIS MANY.

20101217222613.667|20101217222615.333|CCO|YOUNG GIRL AND HER CHILD.
20101217222615.333|20101217222617.000|CCO|I CAN DO THAT.
20101217222617.000|20101217222618.667|CCO|>> IT'S EXCITING TO SEE 
20101217222618.667|20101217222620.333|CCO|PEOPLE RETURN AND PAY IT
